content:
I have noticed that there are transitions effects when stream, user info popovers are triggered.
I think the transition effects are relaxing to view.
We can apply effects throughout the application to popovers, dropdowns, modals, when triggered.
Please share feedbacks.

I believe that one of the concerns we have with transitions and animations in general is that they should be long enough to be just slightly noticeable, but not long enough that you have to wait for them, or that they delay / inhibit you in any way.
So essentially, the delay needs to be right.
